assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: SWS serves on the Scientific Advisory Committees of Population Diagnostics and Deep Genomics, and is a Highly Cited Academic Advisor to the King Abdulaziz University. The other authors declare no conflicts of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Informed consents were obtained from all probands and/or their legal guardians. The study was conducted under the Declaration of Helsinki principles and approved by the local Research Ethics Boards (Research Ethics Boards at the Toronto University Health Network (REB 98-E156), Centre for Addiction and Mental Health (REB 154/2002), Ethics Committee of the Hamburg Chamber of Physicians: PV 3802, Medical University of Innsbruck, and Technical University of Munich).
